snippet: Russia won the long program in men’s, women’s and pairs competition for a resounding victory in the team event, a restorative achievement for a nation.
abstract: Russia wins its first gold medal as host of the Sochi Olympics, taking first place in a new team figure skating competition and reasserting its prominence in the marquee sport of the Winter Games; victory is punctuated by valedictory performance by Russian star Evgeni Plushenko, who becomes the most decorated Olympic skater in modern era; Canada wins the team silver medal while the United States takes bronze.
lead_paragraph: Russia won the long program in men’s, women’s and pairs competition for a resounding victory in the team event, a restorative achievement for a nation.

headline.main: Figure Skating Gold Is Russia’s First
headline.print_headline: The Soul of Russia on the Ice
